short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IMX Cashback allows user to buy on Immutable X marketplace with 0.25% discount plus 0.5% cashback.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to use IMX Cashback?

1. Install extension
2. Open extension in browser tab
3. Add a cashback wallet address (previously connected to Immutable X)
4. You'll see a "Buy with 0.25% discount and 0.5% cashback" on asset page

The app code is open-sourced and have been reviewed by multiple developers.
